|brand = Sagemcom |model = F@ST 5280 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = (RAC2V1S) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC2650 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = VW3FAST5280 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4906; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 (v8) |cpu1spd = 1.8 GHz |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S34ML02G1; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B4G1646E-BYK0; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- Support automdix --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Support Jumbo frames --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wave2, DFS (master), |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = Spectrum customers only |fccapprovdate = 09/26/2017 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4366E; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 1900 |nqam1 = 750 |rad1n = 600 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4365E; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = 750 |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "FAST5280CH/MB REV:1.03A" is silkscreened on the main board. :Also known as ''[[Sagemcom RAC2V1S]]''. The user manual is branded for ''Spectrum Cable''.
<small> A daughterboard with both Wi-Fi radios connects to the main board using a PCIe x1 slot. :This daughterboard has "FAST5280CH/WIFI REV:1.04" silkscreened on it. An FCC filing available 09/19/2017 was requested to be dismissed. :A new filing was available on 09/26/2017. </small>
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.dslreports.com/hardware/Sagemcom-RAC2V1S-h4676 ''Sagemcom RAC2V1S'' on '''DSL Reports'''] *[http://www.dslreports.com/forum/r32027383-HSI-Charter-RAC2V1S-Router-How-to-use-expert-mode ''Sagemcom RAC2V1S'' on '''DSL Reports''' forums]
==Notes== This device have 2 versions. It's not v2, same model, same fccid, same board revision.
1.BCM4906 + BCM4365E + BCM4366E
2.BCM4906 + BCM43602 + BCM4366E
==See also== *[[Arris RAC2V1A]] - [[Arris TR4400-AC]] ([[SerComm]]) *[[Askey RAC2V1K]] - [[Askey RT4230W]] ([[Askey]]) *[[Sagemcom RAC2V1S]] - [[Sagemcom F@ST 5280]] *[[Ubee RAC2V1U]] - [[Foxconn]] U10H128.00 (Spectrum) :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/XCNRAC2V1U XCNRAC2V1U] (2017-06-29) • DVE 12V/2.5A <!-- :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM4709C0; RAM: 2x Samsung; WLAN: BCM4360/BCM4366E --> *[[Charter RAX1V1K]] - [[Askey RT5000W]] - 802.11ax DBDC Router *[[Askey RT4220W]] • ''Cube Router'' - 802.11ac 2x2 Router • [http://www.askey.com.tw/wireless10.html PPage] *[[Askey RT4230W]] • ''Puma Router'' - 802.11ac 4x4 Router • [http://www.askey.com.tw/wireless_RT4230W.html PPage]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
